title: glottolog/glottolog: Glottolog database 5.0 as CLDF
citation: Hammarström, Harald & Forkel, Robert & Haspelmath, Martin & Bank, Sebastian. 2024. Glottolog 5.0. Leipzig: Max Planck Institute for Evolutionary Anthropology. (Available online at https://glottolog.org)
description: Comprehensive reference information for the world's languages, especially the lesser known languages
